post.text: Tune in for a live conversation on making college affordable for everyone with Hillary and Bernie Sanders at the University of New Hampshire.

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: I feel bad for people that actually would vote for her smh...poor fools

replies.author: Susan
replies.text: Yo name says it all, no man u da fool.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: So you'll vote for a killer and someone that will wreck our country??? if people were smart we wouldn't let either of them in...
